name: pathchk
shortDescription: check whether file names are valid or portable
longDescription: Diagnose invalid or unportable file names.

options.name: p
options.description: Instead of performing checks based on the underlying file system, print an error message if any of these conditions is true:

options.name: P
options.description: Print an error message if a file name is empty, or if it contains a component that begins with ‘-’.

options.name: portability
options.description: Print an error message if a file name is not portable to all POSIX hosts.  This option is equivalent to ‘-p -P’.
